location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun, Native Resident, Bushire, to Samuel Manesty, Resident at Bussora [Basra]

mods.abstract: Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun [Mirza Mahdi 'Ali Khan Bahadur], Native Resident at Bushire, informs Samuel Manesty, Resident at Bussora [Basra], that the Alertarrived at Bushire from the Presidency on 20 October 1802. He states that the Alertbrings news from the Government that Major John Malcom [Malcolm] has been ordered again to the Court of Persia, by the Governor General. This letter includes the following enclosures, dated 21 September 1802: an account of the sale at Bushire of woollens belonging to the Honourable Company and an account of the state of the Honourable Company's Treasury at Bushire.
